meaning: Kneel down to / Impressed / Hats off
description: Abbreviation of 「Wo gei ni gui xia le」 (I kneel down to you). Means 「I admire you」, 「I submit to you」. Synonym for admire or impressed. Also can be used sarcastically for speechlessness.

examples.chinese: 消防员整齐划一,给跪了
examples.translation: The firefighters are so disciplined, hats off to them.
I'm truly impressed by this skill.

examples.chinese: 这价格给跪了,性价比好高哦
examples.translation: Impressed by this price, the cost performance is so high.
Holy crap, he's so handsome I'm on my knees.

examples.chinese: 你还是太全面了,我给跪了
examples.translation: You are too well-rounded, I bow down to you.
